name: Cavea
description: Media request management with admin approval workflow and enhanced search capabilities
overview: Adds media request system with user submissions and admin approval, smart search toggle between local and global sources, automatic TV client local search enforcement, and seamless Gelato integration for external content discovery

versions.changelog: Fixed subtitle proxy cache miss issue by ensuring fetched subtitles are saved to database and adding auto-recovery to proxy endpoint.
Removed subtitle caching - external subtitles now fetched directly from Gelato each time.
Modified reviews API endpoint for RapidAPI v2, removed stream/catalog/subtitle caching to simplify database (reviews only), and standardized log messages with âšª emoji.
Initial release of Cavea. Cleaned up dependencies.
